text.content: Zoom Docs - AI meeting doc

text.content: Introduction

rich_text.plain_text: Introduction

text.content: Zoom users' usage scenarios primarily revolve around the meeting cycle. Before, during, and after meetings, users need to handle many manual, repetitive, low-value tasks that can be automated through AI technology, thereby helping users improve efficiency. Through interviews and research, we found that "reviewing and utilizing meeting information" is the area where users most urgently need assistance.

rich_text.plain_text: Zoom users' usage scenarios primarily revolve around the meeting cycle. Before, during, and after meetings, users need to handle many manual, repetitive, low-value tasks that can be automated through AI technology, thereby helping users improve efficiency. Through interviews and research, we found that "reviewing and utilizing meeting information" is the area where users most urgently need assistance.

text.content: Thinking

rich_text.plain_text: Thinking

text.content: In traditional approaches, recording, organizing, and using meeting information is time-consuming and labor-intensive:

rich_text.plain_text: In traditional approaches, recording, organizing, and using meeting information is time-consuming and labor-intensive:

text.content: What users need after a meeting is not just meeting minutes, but further collaboration or discussion based on the conclusions reached.

rich_text.plain_text: What users need after a meeting is not just meeting minutes, but further collaboration or discussion based on the conclusions reached.

text.content: Zoom Docs is a highly suitable medium,

rich_text.plain_text: Zoom Docs is a highly suitable medium,

text.content: by transforming unstructured data generated during meetings into structured documents and tasks, we can build a data closed loop for Zoom, laying the foundation for more intelligent features in the future.

rich_text.plain_text: by transforming unstructured data generated during meetings into structured documents and tasks, we can build a data closed loop for Zoom, laying the foundation for more intelligent features in the future.

text.content: Extending

rich_text.plain_text: Extending

text.content: user scenarios from "during meetings" to "after meetings,"

rich_text.plain_text: user scenarios from "during meetings" to "after meetings,"

text.content: expanding Zoom from a "real-time communication tool" to a "knowledge repository and task tracking platform,"

rich_text.plain_text: expanding Zoom from a "real-time communication tool" to a "knowledge repository and task tracking platform,"

text.content: helping to enhance user stickiness and product moat.

rich_text.plain_text: helping to enhance user stickiness and product moat.

text.content: In post-meeting scenarios, Docs + AI + Meeting data are suitable for completing these tasks:

rich_text.plain_text: In post-meeting scenarios, Docs + AI + Meeting data are suitable for completing these tasks:

text.content: Automatically generate meeting documents, making it convenient for participants to review and collaborate

rich_text.plain_text: Automatically generate meeting documents, making it convenient for participants to review and collaborate

text.content: AI generates customized meeting summary documents based on meeting content;

rich_text.plain_text: AI generates customized meeting summary documents based on meeting content;

text.content: Users can switch between meeting document templates according to different intentions;

rich_text.plain_text: Users can switch between meeting document templates according to different intentions;

text.content: Users can create their own AI meeting summary templates for easy reuse and sharing;

rich_text.plain_text: Users can create their own AI meeting summary templates for easy reuse and sharing;

text.content: Trace meeting details

rich_text.plain_text: Trace meeting details

text.content: Users can quickly locate specific discussions based on meeting document content, finding original meeting records or audio clips;

rich_text.plain_text: Users can quickly locate specific discussions based on meeting document content, finding original meeting records or audio clips;

text.content: Ask precise questions about meeting content to quickly obtain needed information;

rich_text.plain_text: Ask precise questions about meeting content to quickly obtain needed information;

text.content: Reference meeting information in subsequent work (already addressed in the Zoom Docs Contextual AI tools project)

rich_text.plain_text: Reference meeting information in subsequent work (already addressed in the Zoom Docs Contextual AI tools project)

text.content: In document creation, AI uses meeting content as context for writing;

rich_text.plain_text: In document creation, AI uses meeting content as context for writing;

text.content: Directly reference partial information from a specific meeting in documents;

rich_text.plain_text: Directly reference partial information from a specific meeting in documents;

text.content: Solution

rich_text.plain_text: Solution

text.content: Based on time constraints, we focused on the most core user need in the first version‚Äî"quickly obtaining meeting summaries after meetings for further sharing and collaboration"‚Äîletting AI generate customized meeting documents for users.

rich_text.plain_text: Based on time constraints, we focused on the most core user need in the first version‚Äî"quickly obtaining meeting summaries after meetings for further sharing and collaboration"‚Äîletting AI generate customized meeting documents for users.

text.content: Scenario Experience Design

rich_text.plain_text: Scenario Experience Design

text.content: After a meeting ends, users can see AI-provided Meeting summaries in meeting-related Chats and personal Emails, with the option to generate a Meeting Doc; Meeting Doc entry points can also be quickly found in Calendar meeting schedules and the Docs sidebar;

rich_text.plain_text: After a meeting ends, users can see AI-provided Meeting summaries in meeting-related Chats and personal Emails, with the option to generate a Meeting Doc; Meeting Doc entry points can also be quickly found in Calendar meeting schedules and the Docs sidebar;

text.content: If users don't want documents to be automatically generated after every meeting, they can selectively obtain Meeting Docs for specific meetings from the list;

rich_text.plain_text: If users don't want documents to be automatically generated after every meeting, they can selectively obtain Meeting Docs for specific meetings from the list;

text.content: AI Companion automatically generates meeting summaries and follow-up action plans, providing a starting point for subsequent actions;

rich_text.plain_text: AI Companion automatically generates meeting summaries and follow-up action plans, providing a starting point for subsequent actions;

text.content: Users can switch between meeting templates for different scenarios, and AI Companion uses each template's structure or perspective to summarize the meeting, creating documents that meet user requirements;

rich_text.plain_text: Users can switch between meeting templates for different scenarios, and AI Companion uses each template's structure or perspective to summarize the meeting, creating documents that meet user requirements;

text.content: Before the Meeting Doc is finalized, all participants will be checked by default as document collaborators, making it convenient for meeting-related individuals to further collaborate. Users can also manually select sharing recipients.

rich_text.plain_text: Before the Meeting Doc is finalized, all participants will be checked by default as document collaborators, making it convenient for meeting-related individuals to further collaborate. Users can also manually select sharing recipients.

text.content: After successfully creating a Meeting Doc, users can further synchronize information and track follow-up tasks.

rich_text.plain_text: After successfully creating a Meeting Doc, users can further synchronize information and track follow-up tasks.

text.content: Some Details

rich_text.plain_text: Some Details

text.content: 1. Providing a Sense of Control: "know what's going on"

rich_text.plain_text: 1. Providing a Sense of Control: "know what's going on"

text.content: Due to development issues within the team at the time, we couldn't support typewriter-like generation effects, and there was no progress data to return during the process. To reduce waiting anxiety and uncertainty, I designed a simulated directory generation waiting effect, using the actual structure of each template as a directory, allowing users to preview how the meeting would be summarized while waiting, providing a sense of "generation in progress."

rich_text.plain_text: Due to development issues within the team at the time, we couldn't support typewriter-like generation effects, and there was no progress data to return during the process. To reduce waiting anxiety and uncertainty, I designed a simulated directory generation waiting effect, using the actual structure of each template as a directory, allowing users to preview how the meeting would be summarized while waiting, providing a sense of "generation in progress."

text.content: 2. "Customized for you" & "My templates"

rich_text.plain_text: 2. "Customized for you" & "My templates"

text.content: AI automatically recommends suitable meeting summary templates based on meeting title, type, and content;

rich_text.plain_text: AI automatically recommends suitable meeting summary templates based on meeting title, type, and content;

text.content: Users can customize their own summarization methods, building meeting templates using natural language, which can be shared with others or teams

rich_text.plain_text: Users can customize their own summarization methods, building meeting templates using natural language, which can be shared with others or teams

text.content: 3. Even More Efficient

rich_text.plain_text: 3. Even More Efficient

text.content: While users are viewing meeting documents generated with the default template, AI will automatically start generating documents with other scenario templates, reducing waiting time when users switch templates

rich_text.plain_text: While users are viewing meeting documents generated with the default template, AI will automatically start generating documents with other scenario templates, reducing waiting time when users switch templates

rich_text.plain_text: 4. Dark Mode - Tech Feel and Immersion

text.content: Results

rich_text.plain_text: Results

text.content: Currently, AI Meeting Doc has become one of Zoom's main post-meeting synchronization tools, effectively saving time for users and improving post-meeting work efficiency:
